subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jenson Button won his fourth Formula One race of the season by 13 seconds, taking the Spanish Grand Prix in Barcelona ahead of his Brawn GP teammate Rubens Barrichello. Button extended his championship lead over his teammate to 14 points after five races.
